description:
This lightweight, rugged mud guard comes off quickly for cleaning, working on your ride, or snapping a mud-splattered hero shot. This XL version has an extended front tongue to catch even more debris.

  • Fits near the knobs for optimum muck catching
  • Protects fork stanchions and brace, reducing the need for cleaning and servicing
  • Attaches with hook-and-loop straps to fork stanchions and brace
  • Compatible with all forward and double suspension brace designs. Can be used as a rear shock guard on some full suspension arrangements
  • Fits 26in. and 29in. tires
  • Opens flat when removed for easy cleaning
name: Mucky Nutz Face Fender XL Mudguard
